usefulItems: bowl, rectangular baking dish (approx. 30 cm x 20 cm x 5 cm), oven
title: Pollock and Spinach Lasagne

ingredients.content: 50 g Parmesan cheese, cut in pieces (2 cm)
30 g sun-dried tomatoes in oil, drained
300 g chopped spinach, frozen, thawed, drained
40 g butter, diced, plus extra for greasing

preparations.content: Place a bowl on mixing bowl lid and weigh in pollock, lemon juice and salt. Remove bowl from lid, stir then set aside.
Place Parmesan in mixing bowl and grate <b>5 sec/speed 8<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Place garlic and sun-dried tomatoes in mixing bowl then chop <b>2 sec/speed 6<b>. Scrape down sides of mixing bowl with spatula.
Add spinach, ½ tsp salt and ¼ tsp pepper then mix <b>5 sec/speed 4<b>. Transfer to a bowl and set aside.
Preheat oven to 200°C. Grease a deep baking dish (approx. 30 cm x 20 cm x 5 cm).
Place butter, flour, milk, ¾ tsp salt, ½ tsp pepper, nutmeg and basil in mixing bowl then cook <b>10 min/80°C/speed 4<b>.

Spread 3 Tbsp white sauce in prepared baking dish, line with 3 lasagne sheets, spread ⅓ spinach over pasta, then arrange ⅓ reserved pollock. Repeat twice, finishing with a final pasta layer and a topping of remaining sauce, reserved Parmesan and mozzarella. Bake for 30 minutes (200°C) until golden and bubbling.
Leave to rest for 5 minutes befor serving hot, cut in portions.
